HTTP Routing Table

/admin | /api | /auth
 
/admin
GET /admin/
GET /admin/activities
GET /admin/character-overrides/
GET /admin/character-overrides/(int:collection_id)
GET /admin/character-overrides/api/collections
GET /admin/character-overrides/character/(int:override_id)/preview
GET /admin/statistics
GET /admin/users
GET /admin/users/(int:user_id)
POST /admin/character-overrides/(int:collection_id)/delete
POST /admin/character-overrides/(int:collection_id)/edit
POST /admin/character-overrides/(int:collection_id)/upload
POST /admin/character-overrides/(int:collection_id)/upload-batch
POST /admin/character-overrides/character/(int:override_id)/delete
POST /admin/character-overrides/create
POST /admin/users/(int:user_id)/delete
POST /admin/users/(int:user_id)/edit
POST /admin/users/create
 
/api
GET /api/batch/result/(job_id)
GET /api/batch/result/(job_id)/file/(filename)
GET /api/style-preview/(int:style_id)
GET /api/styles
GET /api/template-csv
POST /api/batch
POST /api/batch/stream
POST /api/generate
POST /api/v1/generate
POST /api/v1/generate/svg
 
/auth
GET /auth/logout
POST /auth/login
